attributes.action: Prevent the drilling of oil or gas in Tongham Surrey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Magellan, an oil exploration company have applied for permission to drill for oil and gas next to the Surrey Hills, an area of outstanding natural beauty in Western Surrey, by the Hogs Back. The application has been made without informaing the local community of the impact it will have. No community or environmental risk assessment or impact assessment has been made and this request, if granted will have terrible effects on the local population and wildlife. Sign here to prevent the application from being rushed through the council.
